lst.example: I've never met Fiona's husband.
He is the only grandson of my grandmother.
He visited his uncle.

lst.vn: cô, dì, thím, mợ, bác gái
lst.example: My aunt lives in Australia.
Merry is my niece.
Jik is my nephew.
He is my parents' son-in-law.
That's girl is my daughter-in-law.
I am the youngest granddaughter in my family.
Her grandfather on her mother's side was Italian.
She's his third wife.
My father took me to watch football match every Saturday.
My mother was 21 when she got married.
Liz and Phil have a daughter and three sons.
We have two sons and three daughters.
My sister loves pets.

lst.vn: anh trai, em trai, anh em trai
lst.example: My brother lives in Washington.
Both my grandmothers were from Scotland.
My brother-in-law is an American.

lst.vn: anh họ, em họ, anh em họ
lst.example: My brother's wife and I both had babies around the same time, so the cousins are very close in age.
Has Joe met your parents yet?

lst.vn: họ hàng, bà con, người thân
lst.example: I traveled to Crete with his family to visit his relatives there.
I don't like my mother-in-law.
Her father-in-law does not accept her as a member of family.
My sister-in-law is a friendly person.
They adopted Tom last September.
Jan has two school-age children.

lst.vn: chăm sóc, săn sóc, quan tâm
lst.example: Who will take care of the children?

lst.vn: sơ đồ phả hệ, gia phả
lst.example: Our family tree has been started over 100 years.
Tomorrow is the 30th anniversary of our wedding day.

lst.vn: quan hệ khăng khít, gắn bó với nhau
lst.example: We are a very close-knit family and very supportive of one another.
Anna is her stepchild.

lst.vn: anh (em) cùng cha khác mẹ, anh (em) cùng mẹ khác cha
lst.example: John is a half-brother with me.

lst.vn: chị (em) cùng cha khác mẹ, chị (em) cùng mẹ khác cha
lst.example: Marry and Daisy are two half-sister with her.
My godfather loves me very much.

lst.vn: di truyền, có tính kế thừa
lst.example: The hereditary disease affected three generations of the family.
I dislike my stepmother.
Mr. Mark is his stepfather.
The family adopted an orphan.
There were at least three generations - grandparents, parents and children - at the wedding.
